    A marker in a .wav file. start_time and duration are in samples.

    WAV.wav_cue_read — Function.

    Return the markers from a list of chunks. Example:

    using WAV
x, fs, bits, in_chunks = wavread("in.wav")
markers = wav_cue_read(in_chunks)
    WAV.wav_cue_write — Function.

    Write markers into a list of chunks. Example:

    out_chunks = wav_cue_write(markers)
wavwrite(x, "out.wav", Fs=fs, nbits=16, compression=WAVE_FORMAT_PCM, chunks=out_chunks)
    WAV.wav_info_read — Function.

    Given a list of chunks as returned by wavread, return a Dict{Symbol, String} where the keys are symbols representing RIFF INFO tag IDs: https://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/~phil/exiftool/TagNames/RIFF.html#Info

    WAV.wav_info_write — Function.

    tags is a dictionary where the keys are symbols representing RIFF INFO tag IDs: https://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/~phil/exiftool/TagNames/RIFF.html#Info

    Returns a list of chunks appropriate for passing to wavwrite.
